content.raw:
great thanks for the explanations!  Most of them are clear to me and I think I updated the file based on the suggestions. 

I am not sure about the last bullet point about `OGRE_LIBRARIES`. You mentioned it's useful to keep this variable but don't set it to be a cache variable. Do you mean this variable should be set inside ign-rendering and not ign-cmake?
content.html:
great thanks for the explanations! Most of them are clear to me and I think I updated the file based on the suggestions.

I am not sure about the last bullet point about OGRE_LIBRARIES. You mentioned it's useful to keep this variable but don't set it to be a cache variable. Do you mean this variable should be set inside ign-rendering and not ign-cmake?
